ygData.subject: RE: [Re: [Re: [EQ_Tinkering] thermal cloak]]
ygData.msgSnippet: Whoa, gnomish spirits are sold in FP? Where?  Thought it was only akanon. Thanks. Kilkin ... From: Barry Clark [mailto:custommx3@usa.net] Sent: Friday,
ygData.messageBody:
Whoa, gnomish spirits are sold in FP? Where? Thought it was only akanon.
Thanks.

Kilkin

-----Original Message-----
From: Barry Clark [mailto:custommx3@...]
Sent: Friday, December 15, 2000 5:15 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [Re: [Re: [EQ_Tinkering] thermal cloak]]


1pp each. I sell them as well. I can make a good 100pp in a few hours
sux having to go back to SF to get the metal shafts.
so he stocks up on bags in the bank. goes to Fp for water and gnomish
spirits.
he is only lvl 4, so he is twinking rather than leveling. plus the $$ goes
toward his enchating supplies. which is expensive.

Barry
